# Marimekko
## Capital cities would you live there

***

# Load data
## capital-cities-would-you-live-there


```{r, echo=FALSE}

# Create dataset
df = read.csv("archetypes/capital-cities/capital-cities-would-you-live-there.csv", header = TRUE)
df

```

# Prepare data


```{r, echo=FALSE}

#df_top <- df %>% slice_max(Population, n = 15)
#df_top

df_top <- sample_n(df, 15)

df_top$xmax <- cumsum(df_top$Population)
df_top$xmin <- df_top$xmax - df_top$Population
df_top$xlabel <- (df_top$xmax + df_top$xmin)/2
df_top$label <- paste(as.character(round(df_top$Measure, digits=0)),"%")

```

# Plot

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=10, out.width = "95%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0, 1.25, 0), "in")
)

v1 <-ggplot(df_top) +
    geom_rect(aes(ymin = 0, ymax = Measure, xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, fill = Country), color = "white", alpha = 0.5) + 
    geom_text(aes(x = xlabel, y = Measure, label = label, vjust = -1), position = "identity", color = "black", size = 3 ) +
    geom_text(aes(x = xlabel, y = 2, label = Population, vjust = 0), position = "identity", color = "black", size = 3 ) +
    geom_text(aes(x = xlabel, y = 0, label = City), hjust = "right", vjust = 1.5, position = "identity", color = "black", size = 3.5, angle = 45 ) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 10) +
    coord_cartesian(clip="off") +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(size = rel(2)), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = "grey50")) +
    theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 13, height_svg = 7,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
